Summary: bright red/blue, and green ligths rotating in the darkness
divs: Sighting DetailsHanging above the horizon at least 5 miles away between the city of Garfield toward the city of Rogers. Seemed to rotate or pulsate red, blue or green very rapidly. At least a couple thousand feet over the horizon exactly to my southwest. Watched the object stay stationary for 2 hours becore the earths rotation put it behind the horizon in my valley. Not and lane, not a blimp, never gained altitude, just sat there and emitted bright light. It was not celestial. It did not flicker like an out of atomosphere object. It was not in the line of the planets from nw to se.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Rogers
There were no other sightings in Rogers on or around April 11th 2010
